meanings.definition: A graphic representation of sound waves used in medical imaging.
meanings.sent1: The doctor showed me the echograms of my heart.
meanings.sent2: The echograms helped the technician see inside the body.
meanings.sent3: The echograms looked like a colorful map of my insides.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an echogram, capturing every detail with precision.
meanings.sent5: The echograms danced on the screen, revealing secrets hidden within.

meanings.definition: The process of creating images using ultrasound technology.
meanings.sent1: The echograms were made during the ultrasound procedure.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use echograms to see the baby in the mother's womb.
meanings.sent3: The echograms seemed like magic pictures appearing out of thin air.
meanings.sent4: His words echoed through her mind like echograms bouncing off walls.
meanings.sent5: The echograms painted a picture of the unseen world beneath the skin.
